page.title: 20LIFE IN SCHOOL,SANDIWAY
page.content: {Playground games-}"Tick" is a game in which 2 or more people can play. One person is on, this means that that person has to {Tick}(touch) another person who is then on, and he then has to {Tick} a different person. This continues until we finish playing it at the end of playtime. The person who is on when we finish has lost. I usually play it with Peter, Michael and some other friends. Sometimes we play it on the climbing frames to make it harder. It is harder because you can't move very fast on the climbing frames. {Rounders}is a game we play at playtime. You have 4 posts,at each post there is a person. There are 2 teams,1 team {bats}and the 2nd team{ {fields}. When the batter hits the ball they run to 1st post and if they get to 4th post they get a {rounder}.
